id.title: URL ID
id.description: The unique id for the link.

url.title: URL
url.description: The URL for the link in the campaign.

total_clicks.title: Total Clicks
total_clicks.description: The number of total clicks for a link.

click_percentage.title: Click Percentage
click_percentage.description: The percentage of total clicks a link generated for a campaign.

unique_clicks.title: Unique Clicks
unique_clicks.description: Number of unique clicks for a link.

unique_click_percentage.title: Unique Click Percentage
unique_click_percentage.description: The percentage of unique clicks a link generated for a campaign.

last_click.title: Last Click
last_click.description: The date and time for the last recorded click for a link in ISO 8601 format.

ab_split.title: A/B Split
ab_split.description: A breakdown of clicks by different groups of an A/B Split campaign. Does not return information about Multivariate Campaigns.

total_clicks_a.title: Total Clicks Group A
total_clicks_a.description: The total number of clicks for Group A.

click_percentage_a.title: Click Percentage Group A
click_percentage_a.description: The percentage of total clicks for Group A.

unique_clicks_a.title: Unique Clicks Group A
unique_clicks_a.description: The number of unique clicks for Group A.

unique_click_percentage_a.title: Unique Click Percentage Group A
unique_click_percentage_a.description: The percentage of unique clicks for Group A.

total_clicks_b.title: Total Clicks Group B
total_clicks_b.description: The total number of clicks for Group B.

click_percentage_b.title: Click Percentage Group B
click_percentage_b.description: The percentage of total clicks for Group B.

unique_clicks_b.title: Unique Clicks Group B
unique_clicks_b.description: The number of unique clicks for Group B.

unique_click_percentage_b.title: Unique Click Percentage Group B
unique_click_percentage_b.description: The percentage of unique clicks for Group B.

_links.title: Links
_links.description: A list of link types and descriptions for the API schema documents.

items.title: Resource Link
items.description: This object represents a link from the resource where it is found to another resource or action that may be performed.

rel.title: Rel
rel.description: As with an HTML 'rel' attribute, this describes the type of link.

href.title: Href
href.description: This property contains a fully-qualified URL that can be called to retrieve the linked resource or perform the linked action.

method.title: Method
method.description: The HTTP method that should be used when accessing the URL defined in 'href'.

targetSchema.title: Target Schema
targetSchema.description: For GETs, this is a URL representing the schema that the response should conform to.

schema.title: Schema
schema.description: For HTTP methods that can receive bodies (POST and PUT), this is a URL representing the schema that the body should conform to.
